data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Athos with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Athos, Greece

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Athos.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Athos, Greece by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Athos, Greece. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the South Asian, general people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
There are 2,300 people living in the state of Athos. Only about 11 might be believers.
Father, guide the church in Athos, Greece to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Father, help the 11 believers in Athos to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

location.name: Athos
location.people_groups_list: Jew, Greek-speaking, Arab, North Iraqi, Swahili, Chinese, general, Japanese
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Jew, Greek-speaking (2,900), Arab, North Iraqi (7,000), Swahili (5,800), Chinese, general (19,000), Japanese (1,100)
